QuestData.Title: Taking a Stand
QuestData.Description: A few moments ago I spotted a signal flare over the treeline to the east.$b$bThat can only mean that things are not going smoothly for the Crusaders at Argent Stand.$b$bI cannot leave our post here, $r, but you can. When time permits, make your way up to Commander Falstaav and see if there's anything you can do to lighten their burden.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bloodrose Datura at Ebon Watch wants you to speak with Commander Falstaav at The Argent Stand.
QuestData.RewardText: As it happens there is something you can do to be of assistance, $c.
